content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials** * japanese size 6/0 3 5 mm crochet hook * small amounts of dk weight yarn in at least 3 colors no actual yardage given in pattern **note ** the pattern itself gives no finished length for the scarf it just tells you to stop when you ve reached the desired length 1 http //item rakuten co jp/keito-zakka/c/0000000255/
